projects.title: Calculator App
projects.description: A basic calculator app, which performs addition, subtruction, multiplication and division. Working on this app was facinating and challenging at the same time

projects.title: Expense Tracker
projects.description: The Expense Tracker app is my introduction to React, which reinforced JavaScript concepts. I found the component sectioning of React was easy to follow and work with.

projects.title: Swapi API
projects.description: Working on this app, it opend up the work of API behind the scenes. It was interesting to see the work involved to access organized data from independent third party sources
tags: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Node.js, React, API
